Also, no, Vat. A broken neck is only 100% fatal in the movies.
It's dangerous because the cervical area of the spine contains the nerves that control the heart and lung.
But the bones themselves can be broken without damaging the nerves and thus the person is fine in the end.

I know bones in the neck can break/fracture but a broken neck tends to mean the nerves were severed/damaged. I have never heard a someone call a neck fracture or a bone in the neck fracture a broken neck.
